questions.question: What is the primary objective of pre-commissioning activities?

answers.a: To start up the plant as soon as possible
answers.b: To ensure the plant is safe and operational
answers.c: To test the plant's performance under load
answers.d: To train operators on plant operation

questions.question: What document is used to verify the installation and alignment of field instrument?
What type of testing is performed on piping and tubing systems?
Who is responsible for developing commissioning procedures?
What is the purpose of a pre-commissioning cleaning?

answers.b: To remove contaminants from equipment and systems

questions.question: What is the primary focus of safety and environmental checks?

answers.a: To ensure equipment is properly installed
answers.b: To verify system performance under load
answers.c: To identify potential hazards and risks
answers.d: To train operators on safety procedures

questions.question: What is the purpose of operator training during pre-commissioning?

answers.a: To train operators on maintenance procedures
answers.b: To familiarize operators with plant systems and equipment
